preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 50.0 g of cobalt(II) oxide and 40.0 g of rubidium carbonate using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the cobalt(II) oxide and rubidium carbonate. 
 3. Gradually add 100.0 g of silicon dioxide to the mixture while stirring continuously to ensure even distribution. 
 4. In a separate container, mix 10.0 g of binder with 20.0 g of distilled water until fully dissolved. 
 5. Slowly add the binder solution to the dry mixture, stirring until a homogeneous paste forms.
